koohiiStory1: The romance between Snow White and Prince Charming started when Snow White took a bite of poison apple and her heart stopped.
koohiiStory2: A childhood romance: a boy takes a red apple to school to try to win the heart of his beloved.
readingExamples: 恋う (こ.う), 恋 (こい), 恋しい (こい.しい)
words: to fall in love with, to love
disappointed love, broken heart, unrequited love, be lovelorn,
